channel.title: Shimron Hetmyer on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Hetmyer Heroics and Shepherd's Hat-Trick Lead West Indies to Victory Over Scotland
item.description: West Indies secured a resounding victory over Scotland in their opening match, thanks to Shimron Hetmyer's explosive batting and Romario Shepherd's hat-trick.
